projects.name: Logging Standardization
projects.description: Project to ensure all logging in the Notebook Automation codebase uses the centralized LoggingService and follows consistent patterns for logger creation and usage. This includes eliminating direct LoggerFactory instantiations, ensuring proper dependency injection of ILoggers, and standardizing logging practices throughout the codebase.

projects.name: Notebook Automation C# Logging Standardization
projects.description: Standardize all logging in the C# notebook automation project to use a single, centralized LoggingService. This includes updating all dependencies to use the LoggingService for their logging needs, ensuring that only one instance of LoggingService is used throughout the application, and that all loggers are obtained via LoggingService rather than created directly.

tasks.name: Implement vault ensure-metadata Command
tasks.details:

1. **Scan directory structure** - Find index files defining organizational hierarchy  
2. **Read YAML frontmatter** from markdown files

- Root → Program Folders → Course Folders → Class Folders → Content Files (.md)
- Index files at each level define hierarchy

- YAML frontmatter parser/writer
- Directory traversal for .md files  
- Index file detection for hierarchy
- Metadata inference from folder structure
- Dry-run support for safe preview
- Error handling for malformed YAML/missing files
- Comprehensive logging
